name: auth-monorepo
description: Monorepo with Vue.js frontend, BFF layer, user service, and task service with Auth0

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix bff && npm install --prefix user-service && npm install --prefix task-service
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "frontend,bff,user,task" -c "cyan,magenta,green,yellow" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix bff" "npm run dev --prefix user-service" "npm run dev --prefix task-service"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules bff/node_modules user-service/node_modules task-service/node_modules
